meanings.sent1: After playing outside all day, the kids were completely tuckered out.
meanings.sent2: The long hike tuckered me out, but it was worth it for the beautiful view.
meanings.sent3: The energetic puppy tuckered out the whole family with his constant running around.
meanings.sent4: The intense workout routine always manages to tucker me out by the end.
meanings.sent5: The challenging puzzle game tuckered out my brain as I tried to solve it.

meanings.definition: A piece of lace or linen worn around the neck
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful tucker that matched her dress perfectly.
